pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, May 6, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will virtually meet with the Executive Committee of the Canadian Teachers’ Federation.

Closed to media.

6:40 p.m. The Prime Minister will join a virtual iftar for Ramadan.

Media interested in watching the event live can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.
